name: Dr.Baba Saheb Ambedkar Shatamanotsava Samiti Trust

address: No.63, Spoorthidhama, Hero Halli, Magadi Road,

briefDescription: Spoorthidhama, Baba Saheb Ambedkar Memorial Campus, is located on 30 acres of picturesque, undulating land in Bangalore, Karnataka. It is situated at a distance of about 14 kilometres from the centre of the city. It is being developed as an enduring tribute to the memory of Baba Saheb Ambedkar. Spoorthidhama aims to be a place of retreat and rejuvenation for activists fighting against exploitation, social oppression, discrimination and deprivation of all kinds. It seeks to be a meeting point for people fighting for human dignity. It aspires to become a destination for admirers and followers of Baba Saheb in the manner of Chaithya Bhoomi in Mumbai and Deeksha Bhoomi in Nagpur.
